item.title: Drain outside Green Acre is blocked. They have just started heavy construction on site with lots of heavy muck lifting is Elliot's 70 tonne Lorrie's., 15th December
item.description:
Drain outside Green Acre is blocked. With Lorry's continuously moving lots of earth from Green acre Spring Lane is soiled with muddy water/soil

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Spring Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are at least 9 varying size potholes from the point on the map into the village., 15th December
item.description:
Numerous sized potholes from outside the STW works to the village and just inside the access road to Home Farm. The road condition is appauling and you stated 3 years ago from your safety officer visit (more since then) that the road is being monitored yet it is breaking down. You recently resurfaced a dead end road at Elkstone Hardwick yet you do not do this road which is regularly used!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A frames and cones all alongside Road on verge and all around surrounding roads, 15th December
item.description:
Zoons Court Roundabout and surrounding roads. There are a huge amount of cones and abandoned road work signage all along this very busy dual carriageway and roundabout - it has all been there several weeks totally abandoned - eyesore and potential hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish on the pavement, 15th December
item.description:
